overview: A narrated history of Hand-in-Hand Films, including excerpts from Left-Handed, The Night Before, The Erotic Films Of Peter de Rome, Adam & Yves, Drive, Ballet Down the Highway, Wanted: Billy the Kid, and James Bidgood's unreleased Bagdad.
tagline: ...an erotic film journey from the decadent past to the decadent present. You won't believe your eyes!
title: Good Hot Stuff
